title: 仮想通貨取引所ジェミニ、IPO後初の決算発表　予想超える売上増も損失拡大
contentSnippet: ウィンクルボス兄弟創業のジェミニが株式上場後初の四半期決算を発表し、1株当たり6.67ドルの損失を計上した。売上高は5,060万ドルで前年比2倍に増加したが、上場関連費用が重荷となった。

title: Pontaポイントをステーブルコインに　KDDIが年内にも新サービス提供へ＝日経
contentSnippet: KDDIは年内にも、共通ポイントPontaをステーブルコインに替えて決済や送金に利用できるようにすることがわかった。ブロックチェーン上の金融サービスでも活用できるようにする。

title: Bitdeer Stock Tumbles as Bitcoin Miner Posts Third Quarter Net Loss
contentSnippet: Bitdeer's Nasdaq-listed stock fell sharply on Monday amid a broader sector sell-off in crypto miners, as they embrace a pivot to AI.

title: AI’s Progress Now Depends on ‘World Models’ That Grasp Physical Reality
contentSnippet: A new report warns that language models can go only so far, and that future progress depends on AI that can model the physical world.

title: ブロック社のスクエア、400万店舗でビットコイン決済開始
contentSnippet: ジャック・ドーシー率いるブロック社が、スクエアで全世界400万店舗のビットコイン決済を可能にした。Square Bitcoinは2027年まで手数料無料で、ライトニングネットワークによる即時決済を提供。

title: BNY Sees Stablecoins, Tokenized Cash Hitting $3.6T by 2030 Amid Institutional Adoption
contentSnippet: Blockchains won't replace the traditional rails but will be integrated and work in tandem, the bank said in the report.

title: 米上院農業委員会が仮想通貨規制法案の草案公開、CFTCに新たな権限付与へ
contentSnippet: 米上院農業委員会が仮想通貨規制法案の草案を公開し、CFTCにデジタル・コモディティの規制権限を付与する内容を明らかにした。多くの部分が両党間の交渉中で未解決となっている。

title: McDonald's Exec Stirs Up Bitcoin Crowd With McRib Return
contentSnippet: Bitcoin (sometimes) pumps when the McRib returns. Will this sweet, slathered meat help BTC repeat the feat?

title: U.S. Clears Way for Crypto ETPs to Get Into Yield Without Triggering Tax Problems
contentSnippet: The Internal Revenue Service issued new guidance that Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said offers a "clear path" to stake digital assets for trusts.

title: Senate Ag Releases Long-Awaited Version of Crypto Market Structure Legislation
contentSnippet: The bill brings Congress a step closer to firmly defining how the CFTC and SEC can oversee crypto.

title: 仮想通貨投資商品、先週は約1800億円の資金が純流出　CoinSharesが要因を分析
contentSnippet: CoinSharesは、ETFなどの仮想通貨投資商品全体への先週における資金フローは約1,800億円の純流出だったと報告。ビットコインとイーサリアムの商品が流出を主導した。

title: Bitcoin Miner TeraWulf Shares Drop in After Hours Trading, Despite 87% Revenue Gain
contentSnippet: TeraWulf attributed the increase to Bitcoin's rising price and expanded mining capacity, among other reasons.

title: コインベース、トークン販売プラットフォーム開始、第1弾は仮想通貨モナド（Monad）
contentSnippet: コインベースが個人投資家向けトークンセール・プラットフォームを立ち上げた。米国の個人投資家が2018年以降初めて公開トークンセールに参加でき、第1弾としてモナドのセールを11月17日から実施する。

title: Ethereum, Solana ETFs Get Green Light for Staking via US Treasury, IRS Crypto Fund Guidance
contentSnippet: The IRS and Treasury said trusts can now generate staking rewards for crypto ETF investors without fear of tax or regulatory repercussions.

title: Bitcoin Holds Above $105K as Traders Eye Shutdown Deal, Liquidity Boost
contentSnippet: Ending the government shutdown may trigger a $150-$200 billion liquidity injection, but a continuation could derail long-term crypto regulation, Arca's research head said.

title: Bakkt決算、黒字転換で売上高27%増　事業再編が完了段階に
contentSnippet: 堀田丸正の筆頭株主Bakkt（バックト）が第3四半期に売上高4億220万ドル、調整後EBITDA2,870万ドルを達成し黒字転換した。ロイヤルティ事業を売却し、機関投資家向け仮想通貨インフラ企業やAIサービスへの転換を進めている。

title: Argentina's Libra Meme Coin Case Takes a Turn With Frozen Funds, Payments Probe: Report
contentSnippet: The funds of Hayden Davis and two alleged intermediaries were frozen by a judge due to connections to the Libra meme coin promoted by Argentine President Javier Milei.

title: 米財務省、仮想通貨ETFのステーキング報酬分配を正式承認
contentSnippet: 米財務省とIRSが仮想通貨ETPによるステーキングと報酬分配を承認する新ガイダンスを発表した。イーサリアムやソラナ、ADAなど主要資産が対象で規制された枠組み内で投資家に報酬を提供できるようになる。

title: Uniswap Proposes Sweeping ‘UNIfication’ With UNI Burn and Protocol Fee Overhaul
contentSnippet: The proposal, called “UNIfication,” would activate protocol fees, burn millions of UNI tokens and consolidate the project’s key teams under a single strategy.

title: トム・リー率いるビットマイン、イーサリアム保有量が総供給量の2.9%に
contentSnippet: ビットマインが仮想通貨イーサリアム保有量350万ETHに達し、供給量の2.9%を保有。

title: Chainlink Bounces 5%, But Breakout Falters at $16.50 Resistance
contentSnippet: Strong volume surge confirms the breakout above $16, though profit-taking near session highs introduces near-term uncertainty.

title: Bitcoin Miner Greenidge Settles New York Permit Dispute, Prompting Stock Spike
contentSnippet: Greenidge earned a coveted five-year air permit in exchange for a commitment to lower its greenhouse gas emissions by 44% over the next four years.

title: Crypto Wallet Exodus Acquiring Grateful to Expand Stablecoin Payments in Latin America
contentSnippet: The deal will add stablecoin-based payment tools for merchants and gig workers as crypto payments are rapidly growing.

title: Rumble to Acquire Northern Data as Tether Commits $150 Million to Power AI Push
contentSnippet: Stablecoin giant Tether backs YouTube rival Rumble and has a controlling stake in Northern Data.

title: Jack Dorsey's Block Enables Bitcoin Payments for Millions of Square Sellers
contentSnippet: Payments firm Block is enabling no-fee Bitcoin payments for sellers worldwide via Square's point-of-sale platform.

title: Stellar’s XLM Rises 3.6%, Breaking Key Resistance Amid Bullish Signals
contentSnippet: XLM surged past the $0.3020 resistance on strong institutional volume, outperforming the crypto market as analysts eye a possible seven-year triangle breakout targeting $1.52.

title: HBAR Surge Signals Institutional Momentum Despite Late-Session Pullback
contentSnippet: The token’s 4.62% rally and strong volume confirmed growing institutional interest, though a sharp end-of-session reversal highlighted emerging resistance and short-term volatility.

title: ICP Falls 11.2% to $6.69 After Losing Key $7.00 Support
contentSnippet: Internet Computer (ICP) slides 11.2% to $6.69 after breaching key support at $7.00, with volume surging 94% above average amid heightened volatility.

title: Strategy Buys Bitcoin With Proceeds From Preferred Shares as Key Premium Evaporates
contentSnippet: Jim Chanos said he has closed his bet against Strategy’s Bitcoin premium.

title: ステーブルコイン「USDC」の買い方と特徴｜SBI VCトレードでの購入方法を解説
contentSnippet: USDCとは何か、SBI VCトレードでの購入方法、海外送金やDeFi運用など多彩な使い道をわかりやすく解説。日本国内での普及動向も紹介します。
